mapper.select: select u.id as uid, u.username as uusername, u.level as ulevel, u.deleteStatus as udeleteStatus, u.coin as ucoin, u.nickname as unickname, u.sex as usex, u.mobile as umobile, u.avatar as uavatar, r.id as rid, r.roleName as rroleName, r.deleteStatus as rdeleteStatus, r.roleTag as rroleTag from bili_sys_user u left join bili_sys_user_role ur on u.id = ur.user_id left join bili_sys_role r on ur.role_id = r.id where u.id = #{queryId} and u.deleteStatus = 1 and r.deleteStatus = 1

select id as uid, username as uusername, deleteStatus as udeleteStatus, nickname as unickname, sex as usex, mobile as umobile, avatar as uavatar, level as ulevel from bili_sys_user where bili_sys_user.id in (select DISTINCT upId from bili_follow where bili_follow.userId = #{userId}) and bili_sys_user.deleteStatus = 1;

select id as uid, username as uusername, deleteStatus as udeleteStatus, nickname as unickname, sex as usex, mobile as umobile, avatar as uavatar, level as ulevel from bili_sys_user where bili_sys_user.id in (select DISTINCT userId from bili_follow where bili_follow.upId = #{upId}) and bili_sys_user.deleteStatus = 1;
